root.name: Sensible Golf
root.description: A Golf game created by Sensible Software, the people who created Sensible Soccer. It's in the same graphical style as Sensible Soccer. Tiny guys with big heads.More of an arcade game than a simulator. It plays very similar as Nintendo's Golf for the Game Boy (from 1989). There are four difficulty levels and a full career mode. You can play 72 holes and 25 separate courses.
